description: [Nomadic Octopus](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0133) as attempted to lure victims into clicking on malicious attachments within spearphishing emails.(Citation: Securelist Octopus Oct 2018)(Citation: ESET Nomadic Octopus 2018)
